==Posting or Viewing comments==
===Viewing Comments===
The comments page will provide the user with a list of up to 10 comments.<br>

- The first comment will be saved onto the device and will be a comment made by the creator of the machine which gives a basic description of the part, and includes only the comment itself.<br>

- The following (up to) 9 comments will be posted by users and will include the username, the date posted, and the comment made by the user.  These comments will be loaded from the server and if no connection may be achieved then it will display a single comment: Could not connect to the server.<br>

- If the comments need more space than offered on the screen then, there will be a scroll bar displayed to the right of the screen.<br>
